name: Zen vs Zombie (Achievment Hunter)
description:
Zen vs Zombie (Achievements Hunter) - platformer of a new skool.

This 2D platformer with elements of a shooter, the main feature of which is the vanguard game art
and a record number of achievements in the Steam. More than 10000.

We are the team that loves pixel graphics, but we believe that it has become too much in games
so we decided to go the other way, to make the platformer of the new school.

Mix many different styles, add human images to cartoon heroes and all this
in combination with zombies, money and guns.

Game features:
Record number of achievements
Vanguard game art
Mixing styles
